#summary renderNothing()
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ControllerRequestFunctions Controller Request Functions]

*Description*:

Renders a blank string to the browser. This is very similar to calling 'cfabort' with the advantage that any after filters you have set on the action will still be run.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

-

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset renderNothing()>
}}}
